channel.title: How Do I Change Item Prices And Item Level Requirments?
channel.description:
I've looked all over, and I still don't know how to change a shop price of an item, and how to add stat requirements to certain items. Example: Rune Plate Body, Req. 40 Def.
Please and thank you ;)

item.title: How Do I Change Item Prices And Item Level Requirments?
item.dc:creator: @helldemond helldemond
item.description:
@helldemond wrote:

*Overstock = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] - server.shopHandler.ShopItemsSN[MyShopID][fromSlot];*/ TotPrice = (ShopValue * 1.26875); //Calculates price for 1 item, in db is stored for 0 items (strange but true) /*if (Overstock > 0 && TotPrice > 1) { //more then default -> cheaper TotPrice -= ((ShopValue / 100) * (1.26875 * Overstock)); } else if (Overstock > 0 && TotPrice < 1) { //more then default -> cheaper TotPrice = ((ShopValue / 100) * (1.26875 * Overstock)); } else if (Overstock < 0) { //less then default -> exspensive TotPrice += ((ShopValue / 100) * (1.26875 * Overstock)); }*/

ok shearch for price in clint.java file and you should see this ^

then keep shearching for the item you whant where it says totprice shop value then over stock try the over stock i think im still working on it

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Item Prices And Item Level Requirments?
